TextView.android:text:
Press 'New Reminder' to add a one-time reminder, or long-press to add a periodic reminder. 

To edit or delete a pending reminder, click on it in the 'pending reminders' view. 
When a notification is received, you acknowledge it by selecting the 'RemindMe'-notification that appears in the status bar. If a repeat interval has been set in settings, notifications for the reminder will continue to be sent (according to the repeat interval) until it is acknowledged. 

To customize notifications, select Menu -> Settings. 

For further assistance, please send an email to contact@shipit.se.
